categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Veed was a CR90 corvette used by the Rebel Alliance which served in the Airam sector.

When the decision was made to construct a Rebel shipyard in Airam space, Veed was assigned to the convoy which would bring the needed supplies and personnel. Veed itself held troops which would be used as defense and security. However, the Galactic Empire learned of them. It ambushed the convoy in the Rocrin system. Veed, along with the other Rebel ships, was destroyed.
